product_name: Polar M400 GPS Fitness Monitor and Heart Rate Monitor Bundle - Black
long_description: As your new training partner, this sleek black GPS fitness monitor delivers the usual heart rate data plus in-depth training progress and feedback on how to reach goals and improve your running index.
short_description: As your new training partner, this sleek black GPS fitness monitor delivers the usual heart rate data plus in-depth training progress and feedback on how to reach goals and improve your running index.
